thread.title_full: LAE: The death toll has risen to 1,540 since the beginning of the Zionist attacks » Iraqi News Agency

author: @ina__news
title: LAE: The death toll has risen to 1,540 since the beginning of the Zionist attacks » Iraqi News Agency
text: Follow-up - INA The Lebanese Emergency Authority announced today, Thursday, that the death toll has risen to 1,540 people since the beginning of the Zionist attacks on November 8 of last year. The authority said in a statement that "the total cumulative number of martyrs since the beginning of the aggression has risen to 1,540, while the number of injured has reached 5,410." The authority also added, "The number of displaced people registered with the government has risen to 77,100 in 565 shelters."
